exceptions.exn: In environment Sigma : PropositionalVariables inj_R : Var -> nat -> Prop im_inj : image_defined inj_R pf_inj : partial_functional inj_R in_inj : injective inj_R Unable to unify "Countable unit" with "Countable (expr Sigma)".

In environment Sigma : PropositionalVariables inj_R : Var -> nat -> Prop im_inj : image_defined inj_R pf_inj : partial_functional inj_R in_inj : injective inj_R Unable to unify "injection (?A + ?B) nat" with "injection (expr Sigma) nat".

original: intros H. induction H. - apply unit_Countable. - apply sum_Countable; auto.
